subject: Athletics and Sports
United States Armament and Defense
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Former Duke lacrosse player Jimmy Regan, who chose the Army over law school, was honored by family, friends and teammates as the ultimate team man at his funeral on Friday.
snippet: Former Duke lacrosse player Jimmy Regan, who chose the Army over law school, was honored by family, friends and teammates as the ultimate team man at his funeral on Friday.
